name: CanonLaserPrinter
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Enabling the Canon Laser Printer skill allows you to:

a) Get notified when your printer is almost out of toner
b) Enable smart reorders from Amazon to automatically order toner when you need it
c) Any time can check toner level status with Alexa App.
d) Turn off smart reorders or notifications at any time.

What are Smart Reorders from Amazon? Smart Reorders is a service that enables your eligible connected Canon Laser printer to automatically reorder toner from Amazon when your supply is running low. This program has no commitments or fees. Only pay for the toner you need.

What if I don’t want my Canon Laser printer to automatically order toner?

Smart Reorders by Amazon also provides a Notification mode option that will send you an email notification when you're running low instead. Low-supply email notifications contain a link to a Canon-recommended genuine toner for one-time purchase.

How does Smart Reordering work with my Canon Laser printer?

Your printer can detect how much toner is remaining and place an automatic reorder from Amazon when your toner supply is running low.

Is smart reordering available on all Canon Laser printers?

Smart Reorders by Amazon is available on many Canon Laser printer models. You can find the entire list of compatible printers on the Canon USA website. If you have a compatible printer, we will guide you through the steps to enroll in Smart Reorders during setup.
